headers.Feature-Policy: microphone 'none'; camera 'none'; vibrate 'none'; payment 'none'; gyroscope 'none'; push 'none'; geolocation 'none'
headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; child-src 'self'; font-src 'self' data: https://fonts.gstatic.com; form-action 'self'; frame-src 'self'; img-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; script-src 'self' ; connect-src *
